Definition.WordDefinition: Tombstone, AZ (city, FIPS 74400) Location: 31.71730 N, 110.06222 W Population (1990): 1220 (708 housing units) Area: 11.1 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 85638

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Tombstone \Tomb"stone`\, n. A stone erected over a grave, to preserve the memory of the deceased. [1913 Webster]
tombstone n : a stone that is used to mark a grave [syn: {gravestone}, {headstone}]
